Header.title: Welcome
Header.paragraph: Vergara Handyman Services – Your Trusted Partner in Home Excellence! Mapagkakatiwalaang Kasama sa iyong Tahanan!

About.paragraph:
I have expertise in plumbing, painting, tiling, and various handyman services. Whether it's helping with moving or providing cleaning services, my focus is on enhancing your home with precision and meticulous attention to detail. Committed to customer satisfaction and maintaining open communication, I am dedicated to bringing your vision to life. Welcome to a partnership founded on excellence and a wide range of services customized to fulfill your requirements! And did I mention, all of this comes at a fair price? 
 I bring over two years of experience in corporate maintenance, specializing in the repair of commercial hotels. Additionally, I have more than 15 plus years of experience in freelance projects, as well as real estate management and development.
Why2: Install and/or replace fan, drywall, flooring, tile, TV, water fixtures and more

Testimonials.text: The International Conference on Computational Social Science (IC2S2) is the premier conference bringing together researchers from different disciplines interested in using computational and data-intensive methods to solve problems relevant to society.
Testimonials.name: International Conference for Computational Social Science

Testimonials.text: Canceled due to covid - The Society for Social Work and Research (SSWR), incorporated in 1994, is a non‐profit, professional membership organization. SSWR supports social workers, social welfare professionals, social work students, social work faculty and researchers in related fields.
Testimonials.name: Society for Social Work and Research

Testimonials.text: University at Buffalo's graduate school's student research symposium where I presented the ongoing work regarding an implementation of an early warning system that tries to predict gentrification
Testimonials.name: University at Buffalo Student Research Symposium

Features.title: Ic2s2 Datathon video
Features.text: Video presentation of our datathon project where we won first place!
